thread.title: ApexSQL Source Control 2015 R10 Released
thread.title_full: ApexSQL Source Control 2015 R10 Released - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: ApexSQL Source Control 2015 R10 Released
text:
ApexSQL Source Control 2015 R10 Released
ApexSQL Source Control 2015 R10 has been released. The type of release is a minor feature, minor fix release.
Raleigh, NC, October 19, 2015 --( PR.com )-- ApexSQL Source Control 2015 R10 has been released.
Type: Minor feature, minor fix release
About ApexSQL Source Control: ApexSQL Source Control is a SQL Server Management Studio add-in, which allows you to version control SQL databases and objects. It integrates with all major source control systems and provides you with all object versioning features, without the need for an additional source control client.
For more information, visit the ApexSQL Source Control product page: http://www.apexsql.com/sql_tools_source_control.aspx.
About this release:
New features:
An option to import connections from external options file is added
Improved quality:
5 bugs and known issues fixed
About ApexSQL
ApexSQL is a leading provider of SQL Server tools for database recovery, database auditing, database comparison, documentation as well as SQL Server Management Studio and Visual Studio add-ins for SQL code refactoring, code completion and database source control. We strive to ensure that every one of our tools is a standard-defining product in its class, from the feature set to performance, interface and quality.
Source: http://blog.apexsql.com/
